Name: Juice Cloud
Description: Brewed to minimize bitterness, and maximize delicious juicy Citra Hop flavors. Big doses of oats and wheat deliver nice mouthfeel and leave a lovely cloud of haze. Double dry-hopped with Citra hops leaving a clean, tropical fruit, juicy finish.

Name: Kula Wheat
Description: Hawaiian for "Golden", Kula perfectly describes our American wheat ale. Crisp and refreshing, Kula Wheat is brewed with golden barley and white wheat malt then fermented with 125 fresh, ripe pineapples.

Name: Bomb Pop Slushee
Description: Inspired by America's favorite summer treat, this Slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including raspberry, sweet cherry, and key lime. Thick, tart, and fruity. (contains lactose)

Name: Mo' Juice
Description: This cloudy, juicy, New-England style IPA was bursted with Citra hops and then double dry-hopped with Mosaic hops to showcase the aromatic medley of Mosaic hops such as tangerine, papaya, grapefruit, and orange citrus.

Name: Mile of Munich
Description: "Mile of Munich" is smooth and malty with toasted bread notes and a hint of dark chocolate. This German-style dunkel (dark) lager is loaded with German Dark Munich malt and balanced gently with German Mittelfruh hops. Our 2-month cold lagering process helps this beer finish exceptionally clean with brilliant clarity.

Name: Number 90 Red - Vienna Lager
Description: Exceptionally smooth & malty. Deep red color based on "Number 90" the signature paint color used by Appleton's Pierce Mfg on their custom emergency vehicles. Highlights two different Vienna Malts.

Name: Pineapple Milkshake Pale Ale
Description: Hazy, New England-style Pale Ale brewed with lactose and fresh pineapple- then aged on Madagascar Vanilla beans.

Name: Double Juice
Type: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
Description: We took our flagship New England IPA and DOUBLED the Citra hops for double the juice in this Double IPA! At 8.5% abv, this rich yet smooth hazy base also has DOUBLE the creamy oats - and was specially brewed for minimal bitterness to let the juice shine through.

Name: Space Cloud
Description: Juicy & Hazy, soft mouthfeel with restrained bitterness. New England-style IPA dry-hopped with big charges of Australian Juice-bomb Galaxy hops. Notes of candied tropical fruit with a zingy citrus zest finish.

Name: Uecker On the Radio
Description: A collaboration with Madison's Youngblood Brewery, this hazy double IPA features Wai-iti, Sabro, and Lemondrop hops. Notes of tropical fruit sweetness balanced with earthy Lemongrass. This smooth-finishing IPA was brewed to minimize bitterness, and made to enjoy while listening to a living legend call the game.

Name: Mega Cherry Slushee
Description: A slushee style sour thick with fruit featuring a blend of 7 different cherry varieties, Bing, Door County, Montmorency, Lambert, Van, Royal Anne, Black, and Morello cherries. CONTAINS LACTOSE.

Name: Ekto Cool Slushee
Description: Who ya' gonna call? This Slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including Orange, Tangerine, and a touch of lemon. The ekto green color naturally comes from chlorophyll from alfalfa leaves. Contains lactose.

Name: Juice Mountain
Type: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
Description: Juicy & hazy, showcasing Denali hops which bring big pineapple and tropical citrus flavors. "Juice" is just a descriptor, this beer is made with only water, grains, hops, and yeast!

Name: Quicksand - Oatmeal Stout
Description: When we first brewed this beer, we stuck a thermometer in the mash to measure the temp and with all the oatmeal- the mash was so thick that the thermometer didn’t sink- it stuck straight up. A minute later when we weren’t looking the mash swallowed the thermometer up like Quicksand and the name was born (luckily it wasn’t a mercury thermometer!) Bold flavors of sweet brown sugar & rich dark roasted barley. A huge dose of toasted, flaked oats give this beer its velvety-smooth finish

Name: Pineapple Orange Banana Milkshake Pale Ale
Description: Hazy, milkshake-style pale ale brewed with lactose and fresh pineapples, oranges and bananas. Conditioned on Madagascar Vanilla Beans.

Name: Strawberry Milkshake Pale Ale
Description: Milkshake-style Pale Ale featuring over 4,000 locally-grown fresh strawberries from Oakridge Farms. Brewed with lactose and conditioned on Madagascar Vanilla Beans.

Name: Juice Storm
Description: Hazy & juicy New England IPA, generously dry-hopped with New Zealand Nelson Sauvin, Wakatu, and Motueka Hops. Mildly sweet with melon, lime, white grape, spiced earthy notes and a zesty finish.

Name: Boundary Waters (Canadian-Style Lager)
Description: Crisp, clean, and refreshingly nostalgic. Soft malt sweetness and a perfectly balanced crispy noble hop finish.

Name: Tropic Slushee
Description: Inspired by the taste of the tropics, this Slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including pineapple, mango, and passionfruit. Thick, tart, and fruity. (contains lactose)

Name: All Along the Clocktower IPA
Description: Crisp and bold, this DIPA is double dry-hopped with Centennial, Cascade, Amarillo, and Simcoe hops, giving it a big sweet lemony orange aroma with flavors of sweet citrus, grapefruit and woodsy pine.

Name: Into the Dark
Description: This bold & traditional American Stout is rich with flavors of dark chocolate, mocha, and roasted barley malt; hopped just enough to balance the malt sweetness.

Name: Zea' Cloud
Description: Hazy & Juicy New England IPA, generously dry-hopped with New Zealand Motueka Hops, giving this beer lemon & lime citrus and tropical fruit flavor and aroma.

Name: Imperial Maple Porter
Description: Rich, brown porter highlighted by LOTS of Wisconsin Maple Syrup

Name: Too Caught Up
Description: "They say young is good and old is fine..." sometimes we all find ourselves caught up chasing what's young and new- that's when it's time for a return to classic style. This IPA has intense hop aromas and flavors with balanced malt and bitterness. Featuring Michigan Centennial hops, expect vibrant lemony citrus with soft floral notes.

Name: PB Milkshake
Description: Milkshake style Porter with milk sugar, Madagascar vanilla beans, tons of peanut butter and cocoa nibs and chocolate roasted malt. A quickly dissipating head leads to a nice thick mouthfeel of peanut butter and chocolate deliciousness.

Name: Miami Vice Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour brewed with massive amounts of real fruit. Inspired by the tropical Miami Vice cocktail, this beer is loaded with strawberry, pineapple, lime with just a hint of toasted coconut. Contains lactose.

Name: Juice Grenade
Description: Collaboration with Eagle Park Brewing (Milw). Triple New England IPA, dry-hopped 3 times with the 3 of the juiciest hops we’ve come across. With over 50 pounds of Citra, Galaxy, and Denali hops, this 10% abv beer is an explosion of juicy, tropical fruit hop aromas and flavors. The rich, malty base features big charges of oat and wheat flakes; which combined with suspended yeast gives this beer a soft mouthfeel despite the elevated level of alcohol. Enjoy the blast of Pineapple, Passionfruit, Citrus, and Melon that hits you with every sip.

Name: "Kristin ~ Chocolate Cherry Bock
Description: Strong yet refined, this Bock marries a traditional rich and malty character with the delectable sweetness of chocolate & cherries! Kristin is named after the strong, sweet, beautiful woman that inspired this beer and made Lion’s Tail Brewing Co. a reality. Brewed with Briess Chocoloate Malt and Lagered on Door County Montmorency cherries.

Name: Alive Five Slushee
Description: Every kids favorite juice growing up, this Slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including orange, lemon, grapefruit, tangerine, lime. Thick, tart, and fruity. (contains lactose)

Name: Cranked Black Tea Witbier
Description: A fun play on a Belgian Witbier; rather than using coriander and orange peel we get the fruity and earthy spice character from conditioning on blackberry black tea specially blended by Wisconsin's Fava Tea Co. Brewed per tradition with 50% Belgian wheat and unfiltered.

Name: Twinkie Golden Stout
Description: Golden stout with rich flavors of yellow cake, vanilla, and a creamy finish - inspired by one of America's favorite snacks. Collaboration with Milwaukee's Eagle Park Brewing Co.

Name: Rainbow Sherbet Slushee
Description: Inspired by a frozen favorite, this Slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including blood orange, raspberry, and key lime. Thick, tart, and fruity. (contains lactose)

Name: Royale Noir
Description: Our Farmhouse Ale was brewed with Vienna, Pale, and wheat malts along with locally-harvested clover honey. We then selected French oak pinot noir barrels to age this beer in our cellar through all four seasons. Complex red wine fruit notes, light acidity balanced with a malted base and mild dry finish.

Name: Pucker Patch - Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour brewed with massive amounts of real fruit: Orange, Cherry, Raspberry, Lemon, and Lime. Candy fruit flavor with a tart citric finish.

Name: 2018 Bourbon Trail Stout
Description: We brewed and started barrel-aging our 2018 Bourbon Trail Stout in 2017. Now, a year later, it has taken on the rich character of caramelized sugars from the charred oak barrel staves along with notes of tobacco, vanilla, spice, and oak from the Bulleit & Elija/Evan Bourbon held inside those barrels for years. Together with the stout's roasty base and sticky sweetness of brown sugar and molasses... this beer will warm your soul any winter. Cellar-aging will further develop this complex beer.

Name: Grapefruit Hefeweizen Radler
Description: Bavarian-Style Session Hefeweizen Radler with a big Ruby Red Grapefruit punch. Red & White wheat malts with subtle clove notes from the Hefe Yeast Strain.

Name: Orange Dream Milkshake
Description: Hazy, New England-style Pale Ale brewed with lactose and real Cara Cara Orange fruit- then aged on a big dose of Madagascar Vanilla beans.

Name: Aloha Punch Slushee
Description: Every kids favorite juice growing up, this Slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including Apple, Pineapple, Passionfruit, Papaya, Guava, Orange, and Apricot . Thick, tart, and fruity. (contains lactose)

Name: Vanilla Bourbon Trail '18
Description: Aged 12 months in Bulleit Bourbon barrels imparting rich caramelized sugars, tobacco, spice, and oak on top of the stout's roasty base. We then added Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla Beans to the barrels for another robust layer of flavor and complexity. Cellar-aging will further develop this complex beer.

Name: Venti Is Twenty
Description: Caramel Macchiato Cream Ale brewed with locally-roasted espresso beans, caramel malts, palm sugar, vanilla beans, cocoa nibs, and lactose. Collaboration with our friends at Eagle Park Brewing. How big is it? Venti? Large? At 7.1%, it's IMPERIAL.

Name: Juice Paradise
Description: Juicy and hazy New England IPA with a soft mouthfeel and restrained bitterness. Featuring the tropical combination of Talus, Sabro, and Denali hops. Notes of pineapple, citrus, earthy pine, and a hint of coconut. Brewed with only malted grains, hops and yeast.

Name: We Do What We Want - Breakfast Stout
Description: Pastry Stout featuring flavors of blueberry pancakes and maple syrup. Brewed with bready malts and oats, real blueberries, Wisconsin maple syrup, and vanilla beans. Contains lactose.

Name: Summer Slushee
Description: We teamed up with Badger State Brewing Co. to create this perfect summer treat. A ridiculously fruited, tart, thick smoothie-style beer. This beer contains lactose for a rich smoothie-like mouthfeel. Over 750# of Oregon Blackberries and Meyer Lemon

Name: The Tail
Description: Our easy-drinking cream ale drinks like a lager- light and balanced with a crisp finish. Light gold in color, this classic American style beer was brewed with malted barley, spelt, and oats for a just a touch of sweetness and body. Enjoy one in your backyard or on our patio at "The Tail "

Name: 'Tis the Slushee
Description: A heavily-fruited, thick, tart slushee-style beer containing lactose and a celebration of traditional winter fruit flavors Cranberry, Orange and Plum.

Name: Key Lime Gose
Description: Our take on this classic style combines tangy sweetness from Florida Key Limes with sea salt, resulting in a deliciously refreshing summer beer that finishes dry and clean. Kettle-soured just long enough to bring a mild sourness for a refreshing juiciness.

Name: Raspberry Mango Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour with massive amounts of real fruit including Oregon raspberries and tropical mango. Contains lactose.

Name: Radioactive DIPA
Description: This Double IPA was double dry-hopped with Motueka, Mosaic, and Lotus hops. Expect quenching citrus flavors of lime zest and tangerines, with a bold finish of grapefruit.

Name: 2017 Rocket Red IPA
Description: **** 2017 ***** "Rocket Red" IPA. Featuring Cascade and Amarillo hops, this red balances light malty sweetness with citrus and tropical fruit hoppiness.

Name: Strawberry Guava Slushee
Description: Support Breast Cancer Research as you enjoy this slushee-style sour brewed with massive amounts of real strawberry and pink guava fruit. Contains lactose.

Name: 2016 Bourbon Trail Stout
Description: We procured barrels from two of the best Bourbon Distilleries along Kentucky's famed Bourbon Trail: Willett Distillery (Bardstown, KY) & Jim Beam Distillery (Clermont, KY). Two different batches of our Oatmeal Stout were selected and used to fill these barrels that were just emptied and still dripping wet with bourbon. After aging for the better part of a year, this beer has developed a higher abv (8.0%), and has taken on smooth, delicate characters of charred American Oak, and the rich vanilla and caramel flavors of these two award-winning bourbons.

Name: Blush
Description: Simple, jammy, and tart with a clean dry finish. This classic Berliner Weisse was brewed with Pilsner malt and malted wheat and then kettle-soured to a moderate tartness. This beer is blushing after being lightly conditioned on real Raspberry.

Name: Juice Lagoon
Description: Hazy & juicy New England IPA, generously dry-hopped with Calypso, BRU1, and Lotus hops. Citrusy aroma with tropical flavors of clementine oranges and tropic fruits and a zesty, dry finish.

Name: Mardi Gras Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour brewed with massive amounts of real fruit. Inspired by the tropical Hurricane cocktail, this beer is loaded with Cara Cara orange, key lime, passionfruit, and cherry. Contains lactose.

Name: Oktoberfest '22
Description: This Märzen-Style Lager was brewed per German tradition in the month of March with all German ingredients including Pilsen, Vienna, and Munich malts and Hallertauer hops. The months-long cold lagering process lends a soft dryness to this rich, amber lager that is crisp, lightly malty, and easy-drinking.

Name: Cherry Vanilla Milkshake
Description: Decadent flavors of sweet Bing, Lambert, and Royal Ann cherries on top of creamy vanilla milkshake goodness. Contains lactose.

Name: Sticks & Stones Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour featuring cinnamon STICKS and an enormous amount of real STONE fruits including peach, apricot, sweet cherry, and lychee. Thick, tart, and fruity like peach pie! (contains lactose)

Name: Custom Pale Ale
Description: Have you ever been able to choose your own hops to bring alive a pint of pale ale with deliciously fresh hop aroma and flavors? Coming soon our CPA will allow you to be the brewer and use the modern technique of dry hopping in a French Press right in front of you on the bar top

Name: Chocolate Raspberry Milkshake
Description: Milkshake-style Porter brewed with milk sugar, Madagascar vanilla beans, chocolate roast malt, & cocoa nibs. Fruited with real raspberry to complement the chocolate. Keep refrigerated.

Name: 110% NEIPA
Description: A mathematically impossible New England IPA. Collaboration with Three Cellars Menomonee Falls. Huge doses of Cashmere, Calypso, and Citra hops. Hazy, juicy, and dank with notes of melon, herb, and tropical fruits.

Name: Funnel Cloud
Description: New England IPA featuring two varieties of rye grain for a subtle earthy spice character that complements big tropical & citrus hop flavors from Denali, Lotus, and Galaxy.

Name: Orange Riot
Description: Pale Wheat Ale featuring LOTUS hops, bringing intense Mandarin & Navel orange character. Creamy, medium-bodied, hazy with a mild citrus zest finish. Contains no fruit- only grains, yeast, and lots of hops.

Name: Maple Rye 2019
Description: Imperial Brown Porter with subtle roast, rich chocolate, and immense maple flavor from over 200 pounds of Wisconsin Maple Syrup. Aged in Knob Creek Rye Whiskey barrels for 12 months. 4th Anniversary Special Release.

Name: Amped
Description: Bold, rich American Stout with flavors of dark chocolate, mocha, and roasted barley malt. This stout is amped up with single-origin medium-roast Honduran beans from Milwaukee’s Anodyne Coffee Roasting Co. Naturally contains caffeine.

Name: 'Sup Bro Session NEIPA with SABRO
Description: Session-Style New England IPA featuring experimental SABRO hops from the mountains of New Mexico, bringing notes of melon, tropical fruit & coconut.

Name: Fall Raspberry Milkshake
Description: Milkshake-style Pale Ale featuring locally-grown fall raspberries from Hofacker Orchard. Brewed with lactose and conditioned on Madagascar Vanilla Beans.

Name: Charged W/Clementine
Description: A refreshing sessionable juicy Pale Ale. Charged with a subtle hint of Clementine for nice citrus finish. Charged is an easy drinking pale ale which makes it perfect for any family gathering or sitting around the fire on warm summer night with friends!

Name: Mega Berry Slushee
Description: A mega-fruited, thick, tart slushee-style beer containing lactose and 5 real berries: Raspberries, Blackberries, Boysenberries, Blueberries, and Strawberries.

Name: Hyper Space
Type: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
Description: This Double New England IPA was inspired by Lion's Tail fan favorite (Space Cloud) but is bigger and packs way more Galaxy hops - bringing a cosmic blast of candied tropical fruit and zingy citrus. Hazy & creamy with a soft mouthfeel and restrained bitterness.

Name: CA Love
Description: This straight West Coast Stout is full of California Love. CA Love is a rich and chocolaty stout packed with real sweet cherry fruit and natural almond extract. Aromas of cherry crumb pie lead to flavors of Cherry Tootsie Pop as the beer warms in your glass.

Hazy IPA featuring golden toasted oats and dry hopped with Denali and Julius hops. Green Bay Gold in color and packed with ripe, sweet orange citrus, pineapple and tropical fruit flavors. What better way to remind New England who won Super Bowl XXXI!

Name: Juice Drop
Description: New England IPA featuring "Lemondrop" hops. Creamy mouthfeel and subtle sweetness lead to notes of Meyer lemon, citrus, and herbs that are balanced by the addition of wildflower honey.

Name: Mango Milkshake Pale Ale
Description: Hazy Pale Ale with the sweet, juicy, tropical flavors from fresh mango fruit and Mosaic hops - then "milkshaked" with lactose and Madagascar Vanilla Beans.

Name: Blueberry Pineapple Lemonade Slushee
Description: This Slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including Blueberry, Pineapple, and lemon. This slushee will quench your thirst and leave you wanting another!

Name: Royale with Bees
Description: French Saison Avec Meil "with honey" Pale and Vienna malts with Wisconsin clover honey.

Name: Trappe Door - Belgian Style Black Ale W Door County Cherries
Description: Bright cherry fruit notes dance before a shadowy sweet backdrop of dark malt, ripped with velvety cocoa, toffee & reason. The interplay of dark & lights echoed by muted suggestions of fruit & spice: plum, fig & bubblegum, black pepper, licorice & vanilla Sip, Savor, Celebrate !

Name: Cosmic Cloud
Description: Juicy and hazy New England IPA featuring Southern Hemisphere hops: Pacific Jade, Motueka, and Nelson Sauvin. Brewed to minimize bitterness and fermented with Omega Yeast Lab's "Cosmic Punch" - a new thiolized strain known for generating tropical character. Notes of Passionfruit, Tangelo, and citrus zest with a clean finish.

Name: Bare Bones Collaboration Imperial Stout
Description: Big & Bold Flavored Imperial Stout with flavors of Roasted Coffee, Chocolate, and Molasses

Name: 2017 Bourbon Trail Stout
Description: We brewed and started barrel-aging our 2017 Bourbon Trail Stout last winter. Now, almost a year later, it has taken on the rich character of caramelized sugars from the charred oak barrel staves and the complex sweetness of vanilla and honey from the Woodford Reserve & Heaven Hills Bourbon held inside those barrels for years. Together with the stout's roasty base and sticky sweetness of brown sugar and molasses... this beer was made to warm your soul.

Name: Vanilla Mocha Stout
Description: Rich, velvety-smooth Mocha-Style stout made with cacao nibs, vanilla beans, and cold-steeped Costa Rican coffee roasted by Appleton's Uncommon Grounds. Contains lactose.

Name: Strawberry Candy Blast
Description: Inspired by one of our favorite fruit candies, Strawberry Candy Blast is refreshingly tart with notes of chewy strawberry candies, and sweet field-ripened berries. Fruited as heavily as our standard slushees, but has lighter body and mouthfeel because of the fruit mix. Swirl can while pouring to rouse pulp. Contains lactose.

Name: Citrus'd
Description: This classic American IPA combines Citra, Lemondrop, & Motueka hops for huge flavors of orange, lemon, lime, and grapefruit balanced by the medium bittering from classic kettle-hop additions.

Name: Cherry Limeade Slushee
Description: Forget Sonic, this fun and deliccious drink hits the spot! This Slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including Sweet Cherry, Tart Cherry, and Key Lime.

Name: Juice Phantasy
Description: Thiols (pronounced THIGH-awls) are chemical compounds that give dry-hopped beers their intense fruity and tropical aromas and flavors. To put even more thiols in this beer beyond what dry-hopping gives us- we relied on "Phantasm", a powder made out of New Zealand Sauv Blanc grape skins.

Name: Apple Pie Milkshake
Description: Pale Ale with flavors of homemade apple pie and creamy vanilla ice cream. Flavored naturally with vanilla beans, spices, and pressed apples. More pale ale served cold, more apple pie as it warms. Contains lactose.

Name: Oats & Honey Blonde
Description: This light, refreshing blonde ale balances gentle malt and oat sweetness with a touch of local Wisconsin Clover Honey.

Name: Prickly Pear, Clementine, Mango Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour, thick with massive amounts of real fruit. Featuring the exotic combination of Ruby Red Prickly Pear fruit, Clementine orange, and Mango. Contains lactose.

Name: Lemon Bar Milkshake
Description: Milkshake-style Pale Ale inspired by Lemon Bars! Brewed with Vanilla Wafers, agave sugar, and real Meyer lemon. Contains lactose.

Name: PB&J Milkshake - Strawberry
Description: Milkshake-style Porter with tons of peanut butter and real strawberry, vanilla beans and milk sugar. Brewed with specialty biscuit and red wheat malts for toasted bread crust notes. Mom won't have to cut the crust off of this one! Cheers!

Name: Blackberry, Raspberry, Tangerine Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour, thick with pulp from massive amounts of real fruit. Featuring the tasty combination of blackberries, raspberries, and tangerines. Contains lactose.

Name: Orange Candy Blast
Description: Inspired by one of our favorite fruit candies, Orange Candy Blast is refreshingly tart with notes of orange chewy candies and Cara Cara oranges. Fruited as heavily as our standard slushees, but has lighter body and mouthfeel because of the fruit mix (low in pulp) Contains lactose.

Name: Foundry Light
Description: Refreshingly smooth with a crisp, clean finish. Lagered to perfection for 2 months, Foundry Light was brewed to honor the dedicated metal workers of Wisconsin’s Neenah Foundry, now celebrating 150 years of hard work and exceptional quality!

Name: Czech Please
Description: This traditional Bohemian Pilsner features floor-malted Czech barley, Honey malt, and Czech Saaz hops. Cold-fermented methodically with traditional Bohemian Pilsner yeast. Pleasantly smooth with a crisp, Noble hop finish.

Name: Big Mama's Imperial Cherry Pie
Description: Sour ale brewed with graham cracker and vanilla beans- then fruited with sweet Bing and tart Montmorency Cherries. The higher abv (8%) is balanced well by the dessert sweetness of Big Mama's homemade cherry pie. We use real fruit so some separation in the can is normal; swirl the can mid-pour to enjoy it all! Contains lactose.

Name: Strawberry Passionfruit Lemonade
Description: Slushee-style sour, thick with massive amounts of real fruit. Featuring the tasty combination of Strawberries, Passionfruit, and Meyer Lemon. Contains lactose.

Name: Lemon Candy Blast Slushee
Description: Inspired by one of our favorite fruit candies, Lemon Candy Blast is refreshingly tart with notes of Eureka lemon zest, sour gummy candies, and sweet Meyer lemon. Fruited as heavily as our standard slushees, but has lighter body and mouthfeel because of the fruit mix (lemons aren't pulpy!) Contains lactose.

Name: King Kula
Description: Kula Wheat aged nearly four months in a Spiced Rum barrel from Great Lakes Distillery. The barrel aging transformed our pineapple American Wheat ale- giving it a smooth maple sweetness with vanilla notes and a subtle bourbon character from the charred oak

Name: Cherry Candy Blast
Description: Inspired by one of our favorite fruit candies, Cherry Candy Blast is refreshingly tart with notes of chewy cherry candies and sweet yet tart bing cherries. Fruited as heavily as our standard slushees, but has lighter body and mouthfeel because of the fruit mix. Contains lactose.

Name: Stone Cloud NEIPA
Description: New England-style IPA: brewed to minimize bitterness and maximize the deliciously sweet fruity hop flavors from cold-hopping with Nectaron, Wa-iti and Citra hops. Big doses of oats and wheat make it soft on the palate and cloudy with haze. Notes of stone fruit, passionfruit, and juicy citrus.

Name: #ForTheGraham
Description: Brown Porter with a subtle twist of the perfect fireside S'more. Brewed with real ingredients including marshmallow, vanilla beans, cacao nibs and milk sugar, with specialty biscuit and chocolate malts. Do it #ForTheGraham and show off that beautiful beer selfie to your friends!

Name: Coco Pie Milkshake
Description: Our collaboration project with Oshkosh's Fifth Ward Brewing- this Milkshake Pale Ale was inspired by coconut cream pie. On top of a base of pale barley, wheat, and malted oats- we brewed Coco Pie with graham cracker, vanilla beans, cacao nibs, and oven-toasted flaked coconut. Contains lactose.

Name: Black & Blue Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour- thick with pulp from massive amounts of real fruit. This kettle-soured slushee features the tasty combination of Blackberries, Black Cherries, and Blueberries. Contains lactose.

Name: Cherry Bourbon Stout
Description: Rich, sugary and roasty stout with bold charred oak flavor (aged in Woodford Reserve & Heaven Hills Bourbon Barrels for nearly a year), highlighted by tart fruit notes from the addition of Door County Montmorency Cherries

Name: Charged W/Watermelon
Description: A refreshing sessionable juicy Pale Ale. Charged with a subtle hint of Watermelon for nice juicy finish. Charged is an easy drinking pale ale which makes it perfect for any family gathering or sitting around the fire on warm summer night with friends!

Name: Mocha Stout
Description: Rich, yet drinkable American Stout highlighted by Cocoa Nibs and Espresso Roast Coffee from Appleton's Uncommon Grounds.

Name: Pineapple, Mango & Banana Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour brewed with massive amounts of real fruit. This tropical yellow fruit bomb features pineapple, mango, and banana. Contains lactose.

Name: Manhattan Project
Description: 5th Anniversary Special Release, inspired by the classic Manhattan cocktail. This deep amber strong ale aged for a year in Four Roses Bourbon barrels and finished on hand-crafted orange bitters mash from Milwaukee's Bittercube. Rich caramel bourbon character highlighted with aromatic bittering spices and orange citrus zest. Collaboration with 608 Brewing (LaCrosse).

Name: All the Berries Slushee
Description: Thick, tart slushee-style beer featuring 20 different varieties of real berries: Açaí Berry, Bilberry, Blackberry, Black Raspberry, Blueberry, Blue Huckleberry, Boysenberry, Cape Gooseberry, Chokeberry, Cranberry, Elderberry, Goji Berry, Green Gooseberry, Honeyberry, Lingonberry, Marionberry, Mulberry, Red Huckleberry, Red Raspberry & Strawberry.

Name: Hefeweizen
Description: German-style Hefeweizen. Pours a hazy light gold. Brewed with Pils and soft White Wheat malts and fermented with a traditional German Hefe yeast to highlight yeast-driven clove spice with mild sweet fruit character. Pair with almost any meal or just an orange slice!

Name: Sandbar Pils - Tropical Pilsner
Description: Light and crisp, this unfiltered Pilsner was dry-hopped with tropical Wakatu and Solero hops. Soft hints of papaya and pineapple lead to a clean finish with minimal bitterness.

Name: Firefly Skies
Description: This American Wheat combines the mild fruity flavors of Sundew Yeast, Spicy Tett hops, and tangy American White Wheat. Flavorful, refreshing, and smooth - perfect for catching fireflies on a warm summer night.

Name: Bourbon Trail '20 - Kentucky Coffee #04
Description: #4 of 6 in our Bourbon Trail '20 Series. Imperial Stout aged in Buffalo Trace bourbon barrels for 1 year and then cold infused with medium roast coffee during finishing. Aroma of freshly ground coffee beans followed by rich bourbon flavors of caramel and vanilla.

Name: Bourbon Trail '22 - Willett #01
Description: #1 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail 2022 Series. Imperial Stout aged in Willett Bourbon barrels for 1 year, imparting rich caramel candy aroma and flavors of toffee, vanilla, sweet Mocha, and toasted oak.

Name: Pacific Waves
Description: West Coast IPA. Big, bold flavors of dank resin, pine, and citrus. In the West Coast style this IPA finishes dry with just enough malt character to allow the flavors and aromas of its 7 hop varieties take center stage.

Name: Queen Kula Pineapple Sour
Description: "Queen Kula", our new Mild Sour Ale. Think Berliner Weisse crossed with our classic Kula Wheat... Citrusy Refreshing with a clean, tart, dry finish.

Name: Strong But Brittle
Description: Rich and Nutty English Brown Ale brewed with caramel candy sugar and dark roasted peanuts. Collaboration with our suppliers to support Movember Foundation. All proceeds donated to help the fight against mens' health issues such as suicide, prostate and testicular cancer.

Name: Blueberry Cobbler Milkshake Pale Ale
Description: Milkshake Pale Ale with flavors of Grandma’s blueberry cobbler and creamy vanilla ice cream. Flavored naturally with a heavy dose of Madagascar vanilla beans, real cinnamon sticks, a touch of lemon zest, and chock full of fresh blueberries, this ideally balanced milkshake pale ale is the perfect brew to enjoy when the temperature drops and snow lines the streets! Contains lactose.

Name: Pineapple Peach Lemon Slushee
Description: Slushee-style kettle sour with massive amounts of real fruit including Pineapple, Peach, and Meyer Lemon. Contains lactose.

Name: Run It Back
Description: Light. Hoppy. Citrusy. Low ABV. The perfectly sessionable beer when you want to Run it Back on those warm summer days.

Name: Slow Drip
Description: English Brown Porter finished with cold-brewed medium-roast Brazilian coffee from Milwaukee's Anodyne Coffee Roasting Co. and aged on Madagascar vanilla beans.

Name: Pre-Game Light Lager
Description: Simple, light, and superbly crisp American Light Lager.

Name: Bourbon Trail '22 - Buffalo Trace #02
Description: #2 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail 2022 Series. Imperial Stout aged in Buffalo Trace Bourbon barrels for 1 year, imparting flavors of vanilla, Belgian Candi sugar, and sweet Brandy.

Name: Wisco Mule
Description: Inspired by the classic Moscow Mule, this German-style salted kettle sour is brewed with Pink Himalayan sea salt, ginger, key lime, and just a hint of mint. Lightly tart, subtly salty, and very crushable - enjoy our Wisconsinified version of this classic cocktail: the Wisco Mule!

Name: Banana Split Milkshake
Description: Milkshake pale ale with decadent flavors of a banana split sundae. Brewed with cacao nibs, vanilla beans, milk sugar, and conditioned on real banana fruit.

Name: Balloon Launch
Description: Our collaboration with 2020 LTB Homebrew Open Champion Megan Herzfeldt, this juicy New England-style IPA is lightly sweet with a subtle spice character. Citra, Mosaic and El Dorado hops give it an earthy dankness. This hazy has a slightly higher hop character and leaves flavors of stone fruit and melon on the tongue. Congrats, Megan!

Name: Balloon Launch
Description: Our collaboration with 2020 LTB Homebrew Open Champion Megan Herzfeldt, this juicy New England-style IPA is lightly sweet with a subtle spice character. Citra, Mosaic and El Dorado hops give it an earthy dankness. This hazy has a slightly higher hop character and leaves flavors of stone fruit and melon on the tongue. Congrats, Megan!

Name: Orange Is the New Black IPA
Description: Citrusy Black IPA. Dry-hopped with Wisconsin Chinook & Galena and then infused with massive amounts of fresh orange peel.

Name: King Kula II
Description: Our special release for our 2nd Anniversary, King Kula II is a golden pineapple wheat ale aged in Cadenhead (Trinidad) Spiced Rum barrels with just enough toasted coconut to put you in the Caribbean... even if it's only in your mind!

Name: It's Not You, It's Me
Description: Collaboration with Third Space Brewing, this "Jammy IPA" was brewed light and crushable using hops selected for their berry/fruity character. Balanced bitterness with mixed berry and marmalade finish.

Name: Blue Pom & Cherry Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour brewed with massive amounts of real fruit including Washington blueberries, Pomegranate, and a tart finish from Wisconsin Montmorency Cherries. Contains lactose.

Name: Cloud Burst
Description: Hazy & juicy New England IPA, featuring large doses of a new hop called ZAPPA. Big tropical aroma with flavors of mango, papaya, pineapple, and orange citrus. Brewed to maximize hop flavor with minimal bitterness.

Name: Little Miss - Oatmeal Creme Pie Golden Stout
Description: Golden Stout with rich flavors of vanilla creme and soft, chewy oatmeal cookies.

Name: Viva Mexican Lager
Description: Smooth and refreshing, this Mexican-style lager is easy-drinking and balanced. We added a hint of lime juice for that oceanside flavor. Long live, Viva!

Name: Hoot Loops
Description: Custom blended with the help of Adam & John Carlson of Oshkosh's renowned Gardinas and Ruby Owl taproom using 4 barrel-aged sours. Bright lacto acidity with funky Brett notes, balanced with subtle fruit flavors and rounded out with oak character from Pinot Noir and Spiced Rum barrels.

Name: Cape Cloud
Description: Creamy-bodied Hazy NEIPA featuring 2 juicy hops from South Africa. The combo of Southern Passion & Southern Aroma brings flavors of Fruit Loops, Guava, and Lemongrass.

Name: Crisp Crossed - Crispy IPA
Description: A brand new style, the "Cold" or "Crispy" IPA is brewed with pilsner malt and fermented cold with lager yeast for a crispy clean finish. Similar to the NEIPA, hops are only added cold (dry hopped) for flavor and aroma rather than the typical hot addition for bitterness. This crispy features Enigma and Medusa hops: Notes of Pinos gris, sweet berries, mild grapefruit, and dank resin.

Name: Juice Rush
Description: New England IPA brewed to minimize bitterness and maximize the fruity & juicy flavors of Strata, Motueka, and Citra hops. We get subtle melon and passionfruit notes followed by a "Rush" of key lime and grapefruit citrus.

Name: Bourbon Trail '20 - W.L.Weller Barrel #03
Description: #3 of 6 in our Bourbon Trail '20 Series. Imperial Stout aged in W.L. Weller wheated bourbon barrels. Rich & smooth with notes of vanilla, caramel candy, and cookie dough.

Name: Nuts & Honey - Blonde Ale
Description: This light, easy-drinking blonde ale balances gentle malt and oat sweetness with a touch of clover honey, almond, and peanuts. Contains nuts.

Name: PB Porter
Description: Medium-bodied, deep brown Porter featuring Chocolate-roast malt and heaps of Powdered Peanut Butter. Creamy and nutty with a mild sweet finish - PB Porter has that PB Cup character but still drinks like a real beer. Contains peanuts.

Name: Just A Dab
Description: A joint collaboration with Rocky Reef (Woodruff, WI), This "midWEST Coast IPA" brings just a touch of the Midwest to this more classically West Coast beer. Conditioned on Pineapple Express terpenes and dry-hopped with Simcoe and Idaho 7 hops, this beer has all the dank flavors of resin and pine with citrusy grapefruit zest and a robust, yet balanced bitterness.

Name: Greene's 134 Pale Ale
Description: Rich malty base from German Vienna & English Maris Otter malts, balanced with snappy citrus Cascade (bittering) and Amarillo (dry-hop) hops.

Name: Double Vanilla Pineapple Milkshake
Description: Amped up version of our Pineapple Milkshake Pale Ale using hundreds of pounds of real pineapple plus DOUBLE the Madagascar vanilla beans! Extra creamy and decadent with forward flavors of sweet vanilla and tropical pineapple. Contains lactose.

Name: Strawberry Watermelon Tangerine Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour brewed with massive amounts of real fruit including Strawberry, Watermelon, and Tangerine. Contains Lactose.

Name: Pacific Vibes - West Coast IPA
Description: Inspired by the bold-flavored, intensely-hopped and dry finishing IPA's of the West Coast- Pacific Vibes is packed with grapefruit citrus, pine, and dank resiny flavors and aromas provided by huge doses of Summit, Chinook, Mosaic, and Cascade hops.

Name: Strawberry Kiwi Peach Slushee
Description: Slushee-style sour, thick with massive amounts of real fruit including Strawberry, Kiwi, and Peach. Contains lactose

Name: Brut IPA
Description: Very dry, non-bitter, crisp, effervescent, and refreshing- our Brut IPA was inspired by the dry white wines of California's wine country where this style was recently invented. Dry-hopped with the very rare Nelson Sauvin hops from New Zealand, giving this beer plenty of white grape and tropical fruit aroma and flavor to balance the extremely dry finish.

Name: Root Cause
Description: This American Stout was brewed with Sarsaparilla root and wintergreen, then conditioned on a mash of roots, barks, and seasoning provided by Milwaukee's Bittercube Craft Bitters. The result is a medium roasted stout with a nostalgic hint of your favorite root beer and a creamy finish.

Name: Choco Bocko
Description: Rich, malty, and chocolatey take on a traditional German Doppelbock lager. Pouring a deep mahogany, this Bock was brewed with toasty kilned malts and Ghana Cacao nibs.

Name: Strawberry Banana Milkshake
Description: Creamy, hazy Pale Ale inspired by the perfect strawberry banana milkshake. Brewed with real ingredients and no flavorings, we used heaps of fruit - strawberries and banana - and then conditioned on vanilla beans. Contains lactose.

Name: Fruity Juice
Description: Hazy and juicy New England IPA. Brewed for long-lasting fruity flavor and a hint of bubblegum with juicy Mosaic & Michigan's Emerald Spire hops.

Name: Bourbon Trail '22 - Blantons #05
Description: #5 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail 2022 Series. Imperial Stout aged in Blanton's Bourbon barrels for 1 year, imparting rich, sweet candy-like notes of dark chocolate, caramel, and vanilla.

Name: Violet
Description: Simple,fruity and tart - this classic Berliner Weisse was brewed with Pilsner malt and malted wheat and then kettle-soured to a moderate tartness. Lightly fruited on bright blueberries for a "violet" finish.

Name: Days Like This - Oak Aged Irish Red
Description: This Irish Red Ale breaks from traditional style by conditioning on toasted oak spirals soaked in Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey. Gentle toasty malt sweetness up front with a roasty dry finish. Subtle caramel, fruit and oaky complexity comes forward as the beer warms. "When you don't need to worry, there'll be Days Like This. "

Name: Bourbon Trail '21 - Double Barreled Buffalo Trace #08
Description: #8 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail 2021 Series. This Imperial Stout was aged for 10 months in Buffalo Trace barrels and then transferred to a second set of fresh Buffalo Trace barrels for 3 additional months to impart even more bourbon barrel character. Big aromas of toffee, caramel, vanilla, and candied pecans. Rich and complex flavors of toasted oak, caramel candy, vanilla, toffee and a hint of coriander spice.

Name: Orange & Honey
Description: This light, refreshing blonde ale balances gentle malt and oat sweetness with a subtle touch of sweet orange peel and orange blossom honey.

Name: Carrot Cake Milkshake
Description: "Made from Scratch", this dessert in a glass combines creamy sweetness with the decadence of spice cake. Brewed with all real ingredients including molasses, vanilla beans, milk sugar, carrot purée, and a touch of warming spices (cinnamon, ginger, & nutmeg).

Name: Charged w/Cranberries
Description: A refreshing sessionable juicy Pale Ale. Charged with real cranberries for a subtle touch of tart yet sweet fruit - balanced by crisp bitterness from Mosaic hops.

Name: Juice Dragon
Description: Fruited New England IPA lightly kissed with real Dragonfruit and Lychee. Pouring light pink and hazy, Juice Dragon brings mild tropical fruitiness followed by zesty grapefruit citrus and soft melon flavors from Ekuanot & Huell Melon hops.

Name: Devil's Gold
Description: Lion’s Tail Batch #100. Complex Belgian beer with layers of fruit, mild spice, caramelized candi Sugar sweetness – all with a satisfying dry finish.

Name: Cherry Lemonade Slushee
Description: Made for summer refreshment, this slushee-style kettle sour features an enormous amount of real fruit including several sweet and sour cherry varieties and Key West Lemon. Contains lactose.

Name: Amarelle
Description: This sour brown ale was aged 18 months in French Oak Pinot barrels on Wisconsin Amarelle cherries. Mixed fermentation with lactobacillus and brettanomyces gives tart lactic and acetic complexity. Deep mahogany color. Similar in style to a Flanders brown.

Name: No Holds BarRED
Description: This Irish Red Ale breaks from traditional style guidelines and is conditioned on Irish whiskey-soaked toasted Oak spirals. NHB has all the classic Irish Red malty and toasty notes with a subtle, intriguing depth of character from Oak-aging.

Name: Orange & Creme Slushee
Description: Slushee-style overfruited sour ale brewed with milk sugar, extra doses of creamy oats and Madagascar vanilla beans, and then finished generously with real fruit of Cara Cara oranges.

Name: Fuzzball
Description: New Zealand IPA with aromatics of Peach, Apricot and Pear from native Rakau and Wai-iti hops. Bright and peachy gold in color with a firm hoppy bitterness that's balanced with juiced peaches for a fruity stone fruit kick.

Name: Mosaic APA
Description: 2019 Homebrewers Open Champion Greg Aykens collaborated with us to brew his Mosaic APA. Medium-bodied hops-forward amber featuring the many personalities of Mosaic hops including tropical fruit, pine, citrus and herbs.

Name: Peach Raspberry Milkshake
Description: Creamy, hazy pale ale fruited with peach and raspberry and aged on Madagascar vanilla beans. Subtle stone fruit flavors build as it warms with a light berry finish. Contains lactose.

Name: Sauced IPA
Description: This American IPA was "Sauced" with the juiciest hops we could find. Balanced resiny bitterness with fruit-forward citrus notes from multiple dry hop additions with excessive doses of Ekuanot, Eclipse, and Mosaic hops.

Name: Early Times
Description: Saison collaboration with Milwaukee's 1840 Brewing Co. Brewed in the traditional style with Belgian malts and wheat and then enriched with Buckwheat Honey, Bergamot citrus zest and Rishi's Darjeeling Black Tea for subtle complexities to a classic style.

Name: Sprung Dry-hopped Saison
Description: Hazy, Dry-hopped Saison with bold orange-citrus and passionfruit notes and a crisp, dry finish. Featuring citrus-forward Galaxy & Galena hops.

Name: Cool Kids - West Coast Pilsner
Description: Collaboration with Third Space Brewing (Milwaukee). This crisp pilsner features American Northwest hops. Is it a West Coast Pilsner? A cold IPA? An India Pale Lager? It's whatever the Cool Kids are calling it these days!

Name: Juice Splash
Description: Brewed for smooth mouthfeel and minimal bitterness, this New England-style IPA features bright citrus flavors of lemon peel and orange cream from big dry-hopped doses of Lotus and Lemondrop hops.

Name: Strawberries & Creme Slushee
Description: Slushee-style overfruited sour ale brewed with milk sugar, extra doses of creamy oats and Madagascar vanilla beans, and then finished generously with real strawberry fruit.

Name: Charged W/Pineapple
Description: A refreshingly sessionable juicy pale ale "Charged" with a subtle hint of pineapple from real fruit for a tropical finish.

Name: The Blueprint - Oat Lager
Description: Smooth, crisp and easy drinking yet thick with blended oats. Pouring hazy yellow with a rich white foam, our Oat Lager is lightly dry-hopped with Barbe Rouge hops for a mild finish of citrus and berries.

Name: Bomb Pop Hard Seltzer
Description: Malt-based, extremely low gluten hard seltzer brewed to be easy-drinking and supremely crisp. Inspired by your favorite icy treat, Bomb Pop was brewed with real raspberry, sweet cherry, and key lime fruit.

Name: Peaches & Creme Slushee
Description: Slushee-style overfruited sour ale brewed with milk sugar, extra doses of creamy oats and Madagascar vanilla beans, and then finished generously with real peach fruit.

Name: Pineapple & Creme Slushee
Description: Slushee-style overfruited sour ale brewed with milk sugar, extra doses of creamy oats and Madagascar vanilla beans, and then finished generously with real pineapple fruit.

Name: Hoptics
Description: Double IPA featuring a West Coast hop combination of Idaho 7, Columbus, and Centennial. Dank and resinous with Grapefruit citrus and a touch of tangerine and pine with balanced bitterness.

Name: Threevo Pivo - Czech Dark Lager
Description: THREE Fox Valley breweries teamed up to bring you this traditional Czech-style Dark Lager (Tmave PIVO). Appleton Beer Factory + McFleshman's + Lion's Tail. This lager features a malty trio of nutty, coffee, and toasty flavors with an exceptionally smooth finish.

Name: Sled Season - Winter Lager
Description: Deep amber-colored lager. Rich and malty with toasty character and mild nuttiness. Subtle aroma of winter spices and lagered at cooler temperatures for a smooth and clean finish. Enjoy after your trip to your favorite sledding hill!

Name: Bourbon Trail '21 - Double Barreled Old Fitzgerald #04
Description: #4 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail '21 Series. Imperial Stout aged in Old Fitzgerald Bourbon barrels for 9 months and then transferred into a 2nd set of fresh barrels for 3 months to impart more barrel character. We get classic bourbon notes and brown sugar sweetness. Finishes warm and smooth with caramel, mild clove spice, and rich toasted nuts.

Name: Twist Milkshake
Description: Sweet & creamy flavors of a chocolate and vanilla twist ice cream sundae. Brewed with Ghana Cocoa nibs, Madagascar vanilla beans, and milk sugar.

Name: No Biggie
Description: Our "Session" IPA is a lower alcohol (5%) version of what you love about the style: hop forward, big flavor, and a dry, firm bitterness. "No Biggie" features experimental hop variety #586 and flavors of sweet berry jam and bold citrus zest.

Name: Caramelized Pineapple Hard Seltzer
Description: Malt-based, low-gluten hard seltzer brewed to be easy-drinking and supremely crisp. Brewed with real Pineapple fruit and lightly sweetened with caramelized palm sugar for flavors of a caramelized pineapple.

Name: Citrus & Honey
Description: This light, refreshing blonde ale balances gentle malt and oat sweetness with a touch of sweet lemon, lime zest, and clover honey.

Name: Council Tree
Description: Collaboration with Jon & Sean from Neenah's renowned Town Council Kitchen & Bar. This mixed-culture sour ale was custom blended from 5 varying character sour ales aging in Pinot Noir and Charred Oak barrels with Montmorency Cherries, beet sugar, brettanomyces and lactobacillus added throughout aging. Deep ruby in color, this beer's complex layers of flavor reveal themselves as the glass slowly warms in your hand.

Name: Boujee
Description: Luxurious in lifestyle yet humble in character, this French-style Saison was aged for 1 year in French Oak Sauternes Barrels on Brettanomyces Wild Yeast. Notes of funky Brett, sweet white wine, citrus fruits, and oak.

Name: Bourbon Trail '21 - Old Forester Barrel #02
Description: #2 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail '21 Series. Imperial Stout aged in Old Forester Bourbon barrels for 1 year, imparting gentle aromas of toasted oak and Honeycrisp Apples, with flavors of rye whiskey, molasses and dark caramel.

Name: Graze
Description: This New Zealand Pale Ale features a trio of fruity and tropical New Zealand hops including Motuere, Rakau, and Nelson Sauvin. Expect a mid-range bitterness (around 35 IBU) with bright notes of sweet stone fruits, white wine, and passionfruit.

Name: Stache the Nuts II
Description: Our 2nd annual Movember beer collab with Explorium Brewpub is a hazelnut chocolate porter. Big rich flavor but quite drinkable with great balance. A portion of sales supports the Movember Foundation for Men's Health!

Name: The Tail Cream Ale
Description: This easy-drinking, pale, straw-colored beer was brewed with barley, oats, and spelt malts, and lightly hopped with Summit for balance.

Name: Bourbon Trail '21 - 1792 Barrel #01
Description: #1 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail '21 Series. Imperial Stout aged in 1792 Bourbon barrels for 1 year, imparting flavors of sweet vanilla, toffee candy, and dark cocoa.

Name: King Kula - Rum Barrel
Description: Imperial Golden Wheat Ale aged in Caribbean Rum barrels for 1 year on hundreds of fresh, ripe pineapples. Lion's Tail's 7th Anniversary Celebration Special Release.

Name: Bourbon Trail '20 - Double Barreled #05
Description: #5 of 6 in our Bourbon Trail '20 Series. Imperial Stout aged in Buffalo Trace bourbon barrels for nearly a year. We then emptied the beer from those barrels and filled fresh Buffalo Trace barrels for further aging. The result is DOUBLE the rich bourbon character of vanilla, toffee, and candied fruit.

Name: Snackeroo
Description: This beer was brewed in collaboration with our good friends at Ope! Brewing in West Allis. We took a nice balanced American Porter and amped it up with a hearty dose of Vietnamese Cinnamon, Tahitian Vanilla beans, and plenty of graham cracker to create a snack you don't need to dunk to enjoy!

Name: Rock the Block Bock
Description: This traditional bock pours a deep amber with a creamy off-white head. Although this bock is lagered for a smooth, clean finish - it's rather rich with big toasty malt flavors. Aging on medium-toast American Oak adds further complexity with subtle, sweet vanilla and caramel notes. 6.1% alc/vol. Mild balance from Noble-style hops at 21 IBU.

Name: Sonoma Sunset - Amber
Description: Started in San Francisco 150 years ago, the California Common (aka "Steam Beer") was one of America's first lagers. This rich amber lager features toasted caramel malts balanced by the woodsy and earthy character of the traditional Northern Brewer hops.

Name: Sconnie Surfboard
Description: Collab hosted by our friends at Fifth Ward Brewing (Oshkosh). Your taste buds will be catching waves of tropical El Dorado hops and juicy pineapple in no time when you grab your Sconnie Surfboard!

Name: Blood Moon - Blood Orange Witbier
Description: Crisp, refreshing Witbier brewed traditionally with Belgian Pilsner malt, white wheat, coriander and sweet orange zest - then lightly fruited with real blood orange for a bright citrus finish. Hazy with an auburn orange tint reminiscent of a blood moon.

Name: Kinnifox
Description: This one-of-a-kind fruited Gose (sour ale) was brewed as a collaboration with our friends Component Brewing (Milwaukee) where the Kinnickinnic and Fox Rivers collide. It's fruited with blueberry and key lime and finished with fresh basil and a touch of salt.

Name: (I Would Walk) 500 Milds
Description: Our 2017 Homebrew Open Competition Champion beer was so good we decided to brew it at Lion's Tail and share it with everyone.English Mild with rich maltiness and slight notes of caramel and nutty toast from Premium Maris Otter malt.

Name: Rocket Red
Description: Hoppy Red IPA. Built on a deep red base of kilned malts, Rocket Red features Cascade, Amarillo, and Chinook hops. Smooth bitterness is balanced with bright grapefruit citrus, sweet citrus and pine.

Name: 'Stache the Nuts
Description: Collaboration with Milwaukee's Explorium Brewpub. This is a Brown Ale with all the classic flavors of fresh roasted ballpark nuts. Featuring 60 pounds of house-roasted pecans, cinnamon, vanilla, and a touch of molasses. A portion of proceeds will go to support the Movember Foundation!

Name: Palms
Description: Simple, light, and tart - this classic Berliner Weiss was brewed with pilsner malt plus malted wheat and then kettle-soured to a moderate tartness. We then lightly fruited with the classic POG Juice combination of Passionfruit, Orange, and Guava.

Name: Dark Roast - Coffee Stout
Description: Stout & Cold Brewed Coffee - It's that simple. Rich chocolate, nutty and roasty mocha notes. We infused this classic American stout with a big dose of medium and dark roasted coffee beans for a cold brew kick. Contains caffeine.

Name: 2018 Mr White 2018
Description: Unfiltered Belgian-style Witbier, made with 50% unmalted white wheat for a tangy crisp body and 50% malted, lightly kilned malted barley. Yeast-forward, with mild clove and bright phenolic witbier character. Unspiced.

Name: Drip Drop - West Coast IPA
Description: West Coast IPA. Hopped generously with Columbus, Apollo, and Cascade. Dank, bitter, and heavy in the flavors of resin.

Name: North By Northwest
Description: This Northwest IPA features 3 varieties of hops from the Pacific Northwest - Citra, Mosaic, and Simcoe. This classic combination brings balanced hop flavors of grapefruit citrus, woodsy pine, and subtle dankness with moderate bitterness and a dry finish.

Name: King Kula - Tequila Barrel
Description: Imperial Golden Wheat Ale aged in Jose Cuervo Anejo Tequila barrels for 1 year on hundreds of fresh, ripe pineapples. Lion's Tail's 7th Anniversary Celebration Special Release.

Name: In Too Deep
Description: Collaboration with our friends from Mikerphone Brewing (Elk Grove, IL). We got 'In Too Deep' with big fruit flavors on this soft, hazy New England IPA featuring real pineapple on top of the fruity hop combination of El Dorado, Nectaron, and Sabro.

Name: Nectar - New Zealand Pilsner
Description: New Zealand-style Pilsner. Hop-forward, dry, light gold pilsner that finishes smooth and crisp. Showcases a trio of flavorful New Zealand Hops (Nectaron, Nelson Sauvin, and Wakatu) which lends an interesting fruity combination of flavors such as passionfruit, white wine, and a hint of peach.

Name: Raspberry Arnold Palmer Hard Seltzer
Description: Hard seltzer conditioned on black tea with real lemons and raspberry, then lightly sweetened with cane sugar. Enjoy the flavors of iced tea and lemonade, with just a touch of berry flavor from the raspberry, while sipping on this light, easy-drinking, and mildly sweet brew.

Name: Bourbon Trail '20 - Elijah Craig Single Barrel #02
Description: #2 of 6 in our Bourbon Trail '20 Series. Imperial Stout aged in a single Elijah Craig bourbon barrel selected by Gardina's Kitchen & Market of Oshkosh. Rich toffee and chocolate flavors reminiscent of Heath candy bar.

Name: Old Fashioned Project - Brandy
Description: 6th Anniversary Special Release. Aged 1 year in light roasted oak Brandy barrels. Inspired by Wisconsin's favorite cocktail, Brandy Old Fashioned Project pours a rich mahogany with subtle foam. Notes of Candied orange, Luxardo cherry syrup, vanilla bean, toasted almonds and orange zest with a smooth, sweet finish of aged brandy.

Name: Devil in the Cellar
Description: Special Release for 2019 Craft Beer Week. This beer is Devil's Gold, Lion’s Tail Batch #100 aged 12 months in a French Oak Cognac barrel. A complex Belgian Golden Stong Ale with layers of acidic fruit, mild spice, and caramelized candi sugar sweetness.

Name: Festbier
Description: We collaborated with homebrewer Dan Peters to brew this award-winning German-style Festival Lager. Light amber with a creamy, malty head- this beer showcases 4 German-crafted malts. Smooth and balanced and made to drink all afternoon

Name: Bourbon Trail '21 - Basil Hayden Barrel #03
Description: #3 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail '21 Series. Imperial Stout aged in Basil Hayden Bourbon barrels for 1 year; imparting flavors of caramel, dried fruit and dark chocolate with a smooth flavorful finish of cold brew coffee, light raisin, and sweet brown sugar.

Name: Bourbon Trail '20 - Brewer's Envy #06
Description: #6 of 6 in our Bourbon Trail '20 Series. Imperial Stout aged in a Buffalo Trace bourbon barrel for nearly a year. We then transferred the stout for finishing into a Tawny Port barrel. The result is smooth complexity - as the stout warms discover layers of caramel, vanilla, plum, raisin, and walnut.

Name: It's the Humidity - Pineapple Habanero IPA
Description: This IPA was conditioned on real pineapple fruit and habenero peppers. Sweet and tropical on the front with a gentle spicy heat in the finish. Golden and hazy with traces of pineapple pulp. In Wisconsin it's never the heat - it's the gosh darn humidity :)

Name: Mr. White
Description: Mr. White is a light and refreshing Belgian Wit brewed traditionally with unmalted wheat and pilsner malt, orange peel, and coriander.

Name: Wit
Description: This classic Witbier was brewed traditionally with Belgian Pilsner Malt, White Wheat, Coriander, and Orange Peel. Zesty orange fruitiness, mild spice and a refreshingly crisp finish.

Name: Innkeeper's Daughter
Description: Adelaide Sparkling Ale is a style that was developed in South Australia in the 1860's by Ann Cooper (the daughter of an Innkeeper) after tweaking a family recipe. Brewed and bottled for delivery to the doors of locals, the term "sparkling" was used to describe the difference between this ale and less carbonated cask ales, made by other local brewers and available in hotels.  Inspired by this story, our Innkeeper's Daughter is a refreshing pale amber ale that is top-fermented, displaying fruity ester aromas, a malt-driven palate, and a clean finish. Made with Australian-native "Pride of Ringwood" hops and a specialty Australian Sparkling Ale yeast strain, this is an authentic-style beer that is very rarely made by American breweries. Cheers!

Name: Slasher
Description: Pumpkin Latte Milkshake IPA - brewed in collaboration with our friends at Brewing Projekt in Eau Claire. Milkshake-style brewed with Citra and Mosaic hops, Coffee, Vanilla, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, Milk Sugar, and Pumpkin Juice.

Name: Streetball 25 Lager
Description: To commemorate the 25th anniversary of Downtown Neenah's Streetball, we crafted a refreshing "California Common" style amber lager. The soft malty front leads way to a dry, refreshing finish with a hint of mandarin orange citrus from dry-hopping with Wisconsin Galena.

Name: Old Fashioned Project - Whiskey
Description: 6th Anniversary Special Release. Aged 1 year in charred oak whiskey barrels. Inspired by Wisconsin's favorite cocktail, Whiskey Old Fashioned Project pours rich mahogany with subtle foam. Huge aromatics from conditioning on Orange and Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters. Notes of muddled Valencia orange, brown sugar, maraschino cherries, cinnamon stick and caramelized toasted oak.

Name: Bramble
Description: Simple, fruity, and tart- this classic Berliner Weisse was brewed with Pilsner malt and malted wheat and then kettle-soured to a moderate tartness. it was then lightly fruited on luscious blackberries straight from the bramble.

Name: Peanut Butter Milkshake Porter
Description: Good peanut butter porter. Very faint sweetness, chocolate, hint of coffee, and very mild peanut butter flavor

Name: It's Not the Heat - IPA
Description: This classic-style American IPA with balanced citrus and pine character with a crisp, dry finish. On a base of North American Pale malt, this IPA is bittered with Summit and Dry-hopped with Idaho 7 and Ekuanot. On a hot Wisconsin day - drink a cold IPA :)

Name: There Goes the Rayborhood
Description: Imperial Oatmeal Stout brewed in collaboration with Wauwatosa's Ray's Wine & Spirits. Inspired by the flavors of the famous chocolate cherry oatmeal cookie from Miss Molly's Cafe with flavors of creamy oats, Montmorency Cherries, Cacao nibs, Vanilla bean, and Molasses.

Name: Greene's 134 Wheat
Description: Bavarian style wheat

Name: Downtown Jalapeño Brown
Description: This brown ale throws off a big, fresh pepper aroma from the full creamy head, pleases the tongue with a malty backbone and finishes with just the right balance of jalapeño heat to make you thirsty for more! This was our collaberation with award-winning homebrewer Chris Abel from Neenah who designed and helped brew DJB in the Lion's Tail Brewery

Name: Autumn Blaze
Description: Mild Amber Ale aged in a spent French Oak (Pinot Noir) Barrel. Aged for 12 months with tart cherries, Brettanomyces and Lactobacillus added to the barrel. Mild sour tartness balanced softly by funky Brett and cherry flavor as it warms in your glass.

Name: Bourbon Trail '21 - Cherry - Old Elk Barrel #05
Description: #5 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail '21 Series. Imperial Stout aged in a single Old Elk Bourbon barrel which was hand selected by The Bottle Shop (Grafton, WI). Finished on tart Wisconsin Montmorency cherries. Notes of caramel, vanilla, and sweet oaky bourbon barrel flavors with a lasting fruity finish of candied Luxardo cherries.

Name: Apricot Hibiscus Hard Seltzer
Description: Malt-based, low-gluten hard seltzer brewed to be easy-drinking and supremely crisp. Brewed with real Apricot fruit and lightly steeped with hibiscus blossoms.

Name: Blackberry Lime Hard Seltzer
Description: Malt-based, low-gluten hard seltzer brewed to be easy-drinking and supremely crisp. Brewed with real Blackberry and lime fruits, for a refreshing change of pace.

Name: Two-Tails
Description: "Two Tails" is crisp and refreshing, and was made for hot summer days like these. A Wisconsin take on a classic Bohemian Pilsner, Two Tails leads with a soft malty belly and then finishes strong with crisp herbal and spicey hop notes from Czech Saaz and Wisconsin Sterlin

Name: Bourbon Trail '21 - Elijah Craig Barrel #06
Description: #6 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail '21 Series. Imperial stout aged in an Elijah Craig Bourbon barrel for 1 year. This barrel was hand selected by Cellars Wine & Spirits. Aromas of vanilla and just-ripe banana, with flavors of caramel sweetness and mild vanilla with a finish of toast and spice.

Name: Concord
Description: Simple, fruity and tart - this classic Berliner Weisse was brewed with Pilsner malt and malted wheat and then kettle-soured to a moderate tartness. Lightly fruited on Concord grapes for a rich, fruity finish.

Name: Solstice Wheat
Description: This unfiltered American-Style Wheat Ale combines the mild fruity flavors made by Sundew Yeast with sweet citrusy character from Mandarina Bavaria hops and the grainy tang of American White Wheat malt. Refreshing, smooth, and easy to enjoy in any season!

Name: Prickly Pear Agave Hard Seltzer
Description: This is a malt-based hard seltzer brewed with real prickly pear and key lime fruit, then lightly sweetened with agave nectar. Enjoy in the can or pour in a glass to admire the brilliant magenta prickly pear color. This is an extremely low gluten beverage.

Name: Through the Ice - Cold IPA
Description: A simple grain bill of Pilsner malt and flaked corn along with cold-fermenting lager yeast makes this IPA much smoother and cleaner than a traditional IPA - while highlighting the citrus and berry fruit flavors of Strata and Citra hops. Enjoy a few while watching those tip-ups!

Name: Brandied Cherry Stout
Description: Imperial Stout aged for 1 year in a medium toast Brandy barrel and then conditioned on Door County Montmorency cherries. Warming brandy aromas of toasted oak, vanilla and spice with a hint of cherry pie. Bold, complex Brandy flavors of fruit and oak with Luxardo cherry syrup and a hint of dark chocolate.

Name: Hip Hop Anonymous

Name: Quicksand NITRO Stout

Name: Bourbon Trail '22 - Central Standard #03

Name: Bourbon Trail '21 - Eagle Rare Barrel #07
Description: #7 of 8 in our Bourbon Trail '21 Series. Imperial Stout aged in an Eagle Rare Bourbon barrel hand selected by Cellars Wine & Spirits. Soft oak aroma with orange peel, a hint of leather and faint honey.  We get flavors of charred American oak, caramel, dried dark fruits and baking spices with a dry toasty finish.
